name: Pulumi
description: Azure Pipelines task extension for running Pulumi apps.
helpMarkDown: Join us on Slack at https://slack.pulumi.com.
author: Pulumi

inputs.name: azureSubscription
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment. If you do not provide a service connection, ensure that you have configured your cloud provider by following the setup instructions for your respective [cloud provider](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/intro/cloud-providers/).

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Pulumi Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: For a list of CLI commands and arguments, see [this](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/cli/).

inputs.name: loginArgs
inputs.label: Login Args
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the args to be passed to the `pulumi login` command. Use space to separate multiple args. Learn more [here](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/cli/pulumi_login/).

inputs.name: args
inputs.label: Pulumi Args
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use space to separate multiple args. For a list of CLI commands and arguments, see [this](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/cli/).

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory to run the Pulumi commands. Use this if your Pulumi App is in a different directory.

inputs.name: stack
inputs.label: Stack Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Pulumi Stack against which to run the commands.

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Pulumi version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Pulumi version that should be used. If you require a specific version then the format is `1.5.0` or if you just need the latest version then `latest` can be used.

messages.InvalidScriptArguments0: Invalid script arguments '{0}'. Line breaks are not allowed.
messages.JS_Stderr: Script wrote one or more lines to the standard error stream.
messages.PulumiNotFound: Pulumi CLI does not seem to be installed in your environment.
messages.PulumiCommandFailed: Pulumi command exited with code '%s' while trying to run '%s'.
messages.PulumiLoginUndetermined: Couldn't determine which login method to use. This task extension supports Pulumi Service backend and self-managed backend using Azure Storage. Learn more at https://www.pulumi.com/docs/intro/concepts/state.
messages.DetectedVersion: %s variable detected with value '%s'. Task will use this version from the local tool cache.
messages.Debug_NotFoundInCache: Pulumi not found in the local tool cache. Will download and install it.
